experiences.title: Software Developer
experiences.description: Built and maintained a scalable mobile app suite with Flutter, Django, and MySQL, managing AWS infrastructure. Used GCP for log analysis and debugging, implemented GitHub Actions for CI/CD, and developed a test automation suite for Flutter apps.

experiences.title: Software Development Engineer
experiences.description: Built robust e-commerce backends with Node.js and TypeScript, optimized data imports (1M entries/sec), and created analytics dashboards with React. Improved API response times by 30% and page loads by 50% using MongoDB aggregation and memoization.

experiences.title: Unity Developer Intern
experiences.description: Programmed game logic for controllers across WebGL, Android, and AR projects, specializing in Post-Processing, Lighting, Shaders, and EventSystems for third- and first-person games.
